714.question: what genres do they songs fall under?

3-Table1-1.png: The genres of the songs include Gospel, Sertanejo, MPB, Forró, Pagode, Rock, Samba, Pop, Axé, Funk-caríoca, Infantil, Vellha-guarda, Bossa-nova, Jovem-guarda.
3-Figure1-1.png: The song "Como E Grande O Meu Amor Por Você" falls under the genre of Brazilian music.

714.answer: Gospel, Sertanejo, MPB, Forró, Pagode, Rock, Samba, Pop, Axé, Funk-carioca, Infantil, Velha-guarda, Bossa-nova and Jovem-guarda
